name: spime
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wtru, wi(w0, wex(s0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wtru, wi(w0, wex(s0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wi(w0, wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

comment: Existential introduction, using implicit substitution. Compare Lemma 14 of [Tarski] p. 70. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 6-Mar-2018.)
